description.landing-page: I'm a data analyst in Fredericton that loves all things data! I specialize in crafting visual stories from data, blending technical know-how with strategic business thinking. My varied background in analytics and technology enables me to deliver innovative, growth-focused solutions.

experiences.title: Data Analyst,
experiences.location: J.D. Irving, Saint John, New Brunswick
description: Optimized inefficient Alteryx workflows, resolving inconsistent reporting processes and data issues, thereby improving operational efficiency by 20% and enhanced data pipelines

Enhanced Tableau dashboards to track key performance indicators, by conducting thorough data analysis and implementing validation processes to ensure data integrity and accuracy thereby improving visibility and enabling data-driven decisions
Led the migration of 5+ Tableau dashboards into Power BI, implementing business requirements and improving data accessibility and reporting capabilities across teams
Designed and implemented 10+ interactive Power BI reports with advanced analytics and DAX queries to improve data visualization capabilities for stakeholders and increase user engagement
Skills - Big Data, Tableau

experiences.title: Business Analyst,
description: Analyzed large datasets using Excel to identify patterns, gaps and critical risks in IT systems, presented the findings in data-driven reports that influenced 2 key clients om system upgrades
Conducted IT audits and analyzed 50+ IT applications and systems to identify potential risks and ensure compliance with industry standards, using Excel documentation and internal IT applications
Performed testing on IT controls, compiled reports and streamlined documentation, reducing reporting time by 15% while maintaining accurate data for 3 major clients
Skills - Big Data, Tableau

description: Led the implementation of an AI-based OCR software (Esker) in the EDI team, automating manual order processing for 300+ customers, improving order creation efficiency by 90%, collaborating with cross-functional teams, reducing processing time and errors while enhancing customer satisfaction and engagement
Resolved 100+ high priority incidents monthly, facilitated change requests across systems, minimizing disruptions to global business operations, ensuring seamless order processing into SAP
